Contact Us
Seville Quarter is located in the heart of downtown Pensacola.
130 E. Government St.
Pensacola, FL 32502
(850) 434-6211
Use the adjacent form to send us a general question or comment, or the links below for private event and employment inquiries.
Private Event Inquiries
Employment Inquiries

Join the Club
Membership has its benefits!
Being a member at Seville Quarter means you don’t have to pay an Entertainment Charge for normal events, and you get free or discounted admission at special events.
Other benefits include:
OVER $500,000+ IN YEARLY ENTERTAINMENT
FREE ADMISSION or Reduced EVERY DAY
FAST PASS ENTRY. MOVE TO THE FRONT OF THE LINE!
Weekly Membership Drink Specials
Membership Night Drink Specials every Saturday Night
10% Discount on VIP Bottle Service
FREE Drink every Wednesday before 6pm
Advance Concert Ticket Sales Opportunity
Discount on Concert Tickets and other Special Event
Early Entry into Special Events & Concerts
VIP Meet & Greet Passes for Special Concerts
VIP Birthday Treatment (VIP Admission for card holder and 3 Friends) and 1st Drink Free (in Fast Eddies) on your actual birthday
Be the First to know what is Happening Downtown at Seville Quarter
Membership definitely has its privileges!
* Entertainment & membership specials are subject to change without prior notice
2025 Regular Membership Card
Only $80 For 2025
Entitles the owner to free or reduced admission, membership privileges and discounts.
2025 VIP Membership Card
$400 For 2025
Entitles the owner & three guests to free admission, membership privileges and discounts.
